document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the Maechidiini Burmeister, 1855 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae) from the Indo-Australian transition zone, and the first record of the tribe west of Wallace’s Line

subSubSection.paragraph:
Lama vill., 02°33’50”S , 140°27’20”E , 150-165 m , 31.III.2018 , semidry eucalypt forest, from flowers & pitchers of
Nepenthes
sp., leg. D.Telnov”; DTC ( Figs 751–753 for habitat).
Female lamellae of antennal club shorter; labroclypeus subtruncate anteriorly, not or vaguely emarginate.
